content: Sporting event delegation [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) competed in the [2017 Summer Deaflympics](/wiki/2017_Summer_Deaflympics) which was held in [Samsun](/wiki/Samsun), [Turkey](/wiki/Turkey) after narrowly missing the opportunity to compete at the [2013 Summer Deaflympics](/wiki/2013_Summer_Deaflympics). Singapore sent a delegation consisting of 5 participants for the event. This was only the fourth time that Singapore was eligible participate at the [Summer Deaflympics](/wiki/Deaflympics) after making its Deaflympic debut in 2001. ## Medalists MedalNameSportEventDate GoldAdelia Naomi Yokoyama[Bowling](/wiki/Bowling_at_the_2017_Summer_Deaflympics)Women masters29 July BronzeHwee Kimberly Quek[Bowling](/wiki/Bowling_at_the_2017_Summer_Deaflympics)Women masters29 July ## Medal table Sport Gold Silver BronzeTotal[Bowling](/wiki/Bowling_at_the_2017_Summer_Deaflympics)1012 - Singapore at the Deaflympics This article about sports in Singapore is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Singapore at the 2017 Summer Deaflympics
